attributes.action: ban films of a violent nature of members of the public being attacked physically without consent being allowed to be available for free viewing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Online video sharing websites should be made by law to be accountable to regulate the content they host for legality and morality. This should be done with similar standards as our televison services, with the same channels of complaint and guidelines of conduct.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
